Name: Westergasterras
Review Text: Gorgeous location with a large, comfortable terrace. Food was tasty (although prices seemed a bit high for some items) and service was friendly. Make a reservation as it got really busy, and note that you currently have to order at the bar due to the COVID situation.

Name: Westergasterras
Review Text: Go here almost every weekend with the kids. Kids can play outside. Service has improved. Dogs allowed. Good for drinks, lunch is ok. Nicely located in Westerpark. Good sunbeams from 12:00-18:00

Name: Westergasterras
Review Text: Tasty fusion food and nice beers! A bit overpriced. But cute terrace and good ambience.

Name: Westergasterras

Name: Westergasterras

Name: Westergasterras
Review Text: Amazing establishment + music + vibes just need to not charge people to use a toilet or get water. Not cool

Name: Westergasterras

Name: Westergasterras

Name: Westergasterras

Name: Westergasterras

Thank you!

Name: Westergasterras

Name: Westergasterras
Review Text: This place is a hidden gem. Itâ€™s very gezellig, both outside and inside. The service very friendly and with humour. The food and drinks great the price right. You should definitely trustbusters one out. We will be back..

Name: Westergasterras
Review Text: Nice spot with lovely cafe and terrace. I came here 20 years ago and the place was squatted. Back then the gave you a can of bear from a box on the floor for 50cts. Now it is a yuppie hipster paradise. Still a nice spot though

Review Text: It's a very nice spot for a drink or lunch. I good location in the middle of the Westerpark with artificial little relaxing waterfalls next to it. It could be a perfect place for studying or working with your laptop but they have no internet, which they should fix.

Name: Westergasterras
Review Text: Beautiful hidden spot, but the service isn't good. Been there several times and the same story repeats again and again - you have to wait a long time until served, the food and drinks are really nothing special and the prices are not cheap.
